title: Garcia: Barcelona ´need to be proud´ despite Champions League exit
description: Eric Garcia says Barcelona “need to be proud” of what they have accomplished this season, despite their Champions League semi-final loss to Inter. Barcelona were beaten 4-3 at San Siro in the second leg, losing 7-6 on aggregate, but came from 2-0 down at half-time on Tuesday. Lautaro Martinez and Hakan Calhanoglu had given Inter […] The post Garcia: Barcelona ´need to be proud´ despite Champions League exit appeared first on Soccer News.
